newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: Max s/holders approve move into fertiliser.
newsitem.headline: Max s/holders approve move into fertiliser.

text.p: Max Resources NL said on Friday its shareholders had resolved to adopt a change in the essential nature of the company's business, to become that of a manufacturer and distributor of organic fertiliser.

An extraordinary meeting also approved: the purchase of certain organic fertiliser producing assets in the United States; the purchase of joint venture interests in companies with organic fertiliser production assets/projects in Indonesia, India and Sri Lanka; and various placements or securities to fund the new business opportunities, Max said in a statement.
Max, a resource investor, said in January it planned to sell its gold mining assets to focus on its new organic fertiliser business.
